required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Tazarotene Gel in Nail Psoriasis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Trial to Evaluate the Anti-psoriatic Efficacy and Tolerability of Tazarotene in a Gel Formulation in Patients With Mild to Moderate Nail Psoriasis - Parallel Group Comparison

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of topical application of the gel compared to placebo in nail psoriasis.

primary_outcome.measure: % reduction in the Nail Psoriasis Severity Index ( NAPSI )

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
